content: this table runner will add some elegance and a personal touch to your home i hope you enjoy making it materials 5 mm crochet hook 750 yards of category 4 yarn caron cotton cakes in white or similar yarn weight tapestry needle scissors the runner measures about 15 x 90 but the size can be customized by adding/subtracting row the difficulty is advanced beginner the video and instructional pictures are included if you have any questions about the pattern please feel free to ask them via email anyutadesigns@gmail com or through my instagram www instagram com/anyutadesigns i ll be happy to answer them
